features: Chisel tip for broad, medium, or fine lines

body.description: EXPO Low Odor Dry Erase Markers feature vivid ink that’s easy to see from a distance and provides consistent color quality. These Expo dry erase markers erase cleanly and easily from whiteboards and other non-porous surfaces with a dry cloth or EXPO eraser. The dry erase marker ink is specially formulated to be low-odor making it perfect for use in classrooms, offices, and homes. Use your colorful EXPO dry erase markers to track, schedule, and present.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Make Life Remarkable Expo isn't limited to how, when and what you write; it's about creating a smarter way to communicate. That's why great design and intuitive functionality are among the most important benefits of Expo writing systems. The goal is to continue making products with contemporary designs, colors and features that integrate all of your important information into one flexible space. So when life gets messy, you always have a clean slate to figure it out. Expo Low-Odor Dry Erase Markers Safe and effective for shared spaces With a non-toxic, low-odor formula, Expo Low-Odor Dry-Erase Markers are perfect for making notes and presenting information at home, in classrooms or office. The quick-drying, colorful ink produces sharp, skip-free lines, so your messages are clear and legible for students and colleagues. Choose from 4 durable tip options to create easy-to-read lettering on non-porous surfaces. The better-erasing ink makes it easy to mark up a whiteboard and then quickly erase messages to start all over again. Non-toxic, low-odor ink is safe and effective in classrooms, small offices and homes Quick-drying formula writes on most non-porous surfaces Choose from 4 durable tip options—ultra fine, fine, bullet and chisel Available in 12 bold colors

Ideas to Simplify Your Life and Embrace Your Space with Expo Life Labeled Use Expo markers to label your plastic containers. If they're clear, taping a small piece of paper on the opposite side will keep your label legible. Chore Board Using a whiteboard and Expo markers to make a family chore board is the simple solution to getting everyone to pitch in without pitching a fit. Add You to the To Do's If your family's activities constantly take priority, it's about time you move up on the list. Create a family calendar on your whiteboard and schedule a few hours for you using Expo markers. Entertaining Possibilities Use Expo markers on glass trays to write out the names of specialty hors d'oeuvres or wine and cheese pairings. You can also write on small decorative tiles for reusable place settings or buffet labels.

Your Favorite Expo Products Expo Original Dry Erase Markers You can’t go wrong with an original. Whatever your needs, the Expo Original Dry-Erase Marker can help you get your point across. Choose from a beautiful collection of bold colors and a wide range of tip sizes. Expo Click Dry Erase Markers Simply click and start writing with Expo Clickable Dry-Erase Markers. The unique design means no lost caps, and the Safety Seal valve keeps ink from drying out for smooth writing and vibrant color every time. Expo Neon Window Markers Add a splash of bold color to windows, glass materials, whiteboards and other surfaces with Expo Neon Window Markers, which allow you to write on both black and white surfaces for eye-catching color and detail. Expo Low-Odor Dry Erase Markers Expo Low-Odor Dry-Erase Markers minimize unpleasant smells at home or in the classroom. The low-odor formula is safe for children, and the quick-drying ink ensures that your messages remain clear and easy to read.

Expo Scented Dry Erase Markers Catch the attention of your students or kids with Expo Scented Dry-Erase Markers, which come in a selection of mouthwatering color/scent combinations, including mint chocolate, cherry, blueberry and apple. Expo Washable Dry Erase Markers Expo Washable Dry-Erase Markers are easy to wash out of skin and most carpets and upholstery, so you and your little one can play or draw without making a mess in your home. Expo Vis-à-Vis Wet Erase Markers Expo Vis-à-Vis Wet-Erase Markers stay in place on transparencies, laminated cards, and whiteboards, so you can leave messages up for as long as you need, and then erase them with a damp cloth and start again. Expo Accessories Expo carries dry-erase whiteboards and erasers in a variety of styles and sizes to suit your needs. Stock up on non-toxic liquid cleaner, microfiber cleaning cloths, and towelettes so you can make a mess and then wipe the slate clean again and again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lasting vibrant color markers
reviews.reviewText: Expo dry erase markers are the best for writing on whiteboards. They have no odor which is perfect for classrooms or offices. The variety of vivid colors in this pack is excellent. They truly stand out. I’ve tried other brands of dry erase markers but this one last so much longer. They erase cleanly and easily too.On a side note, I have a toddler in the house who loves this markers but always forget to but the cap one and they don’t dry out. Big plus if you have kids in the house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewText: These worked great. I love all the different colors. We used them to make a sign for our food truck. Some of the colors were harder to get off then others but we found a Magic Eraser made it come off much easier.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Favorite Markers, but dont last long
reviews.reviewText: I love these dry erase markers, and use them for personal use to keep up with my to-do lists, and dry erase calendar. It could just be me, but I feel like I am always having to buy more! But, they work great, color is quite close, and very smooth to write. They do seem to dry up pretty fast, but its expected at this point! I will continue to buy these markers

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: As someone who relies heavily on visual aids for planning and organizing, I can't say enough good things about Expo dry erase markers. They're like magic wands for my whiteboard, with vibrant colors that make my ideas pop and a smooth writing experience that feels almost therapeutic. The chisel tip gives me the versatility I need for both big-picture concepts and fine details. The low odor ink is a huge plus, keeping my workspace comfortable even during long brainstorming sessions. Overall, Expo dry erase markers are a reliable choice for anyone in need of quality writing tools for their whiteboard needs.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The colors are vibrant! However, 2 of the markers don't work. They came with the ends popped out which caused them to be dried out. I was really disappointed but not enough to return them.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A rainbow of markers
reviews.reviewText: Great bold, virus, fun colors! Fun to use!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Purchased these to donate to my child’s classroom. Just what they needed and a good value for the quantity.

Compré este producto en promoción y me salieron a mitad del precio original, lo que bajó el costo por unidad considerablemente. Los colores son brillantes, no tienen olor, y la tinta aguanta muchísimo, también si algún día los dejas sin tapar por accidente, no se secan tan rápido como otros marcadores. Los recomiendo ampliamente.
